ygData.subject: Re: Off Topic: King Ak'anon
ygData.msgSnippet: Scewers can be made with the Smithing or Pottery Trade Skills. Several of the items you need to make tinkered items require items that can only be made with
ygData.messageBody:
Scewers can be made with the Smithing or Pottery Trade Skills. Several of
the items you need to make tinkered items require items that can only be
made with Smithing or Pottery so it would be wise to go into one of those
skills.

-Kevin
